page.title: 01General Description
page.content:
The block we have been given covers a section of the valley of the River Orwell where the river enters Harwich Harbour.
The land on the east of the river is in the parish of Trimley St.Mary and the land on the west is in Shotley. The Trimley section stretches from the High Road near St.Mary's church down to the river.It is mostly farmland but it includes the northern section of Felixstowe Dock and an area of salt marsh and mud flat.
The Shotley section includes some housing,especially a large estate of military houses,part of the Eurosports Village,and a good deal of farmland.
